Package service.arf

Interface Summary
ARF The adaptation reasoning and validation framework to reason on DiVA problems.
InputHandle The input handle interface encapsulates the context model and configuration model.
Log The log interface provides access to a protocol and a statistics regarding a reasoning and validation task.
ModelHandle The model handle interface encapsulates the reasoning model.
Protocol The protocol interface provides access to information about a reasoning and validation task.
Statistics The statistics interface provides access to errors, warnings and information of a reasoning and validation task.
 

Class Summary
ARF.QUERIES Constants for all names of queries which are fixed part of the framework.
ARF.QUESTIONS Constants for all names of questions which are fixed part of the framework.
ARF.REASONER Constants for all names of reasoner which are fixed part of the reasoner.
Log.EMPTY An empty logging information object.
Protocol.EMPTY An empty protocol object.
ReasoningParameters The reasoning parameters specifies a reasoning and validation task.
Statistics.EMPTY An empty statistics object.
